metadata.title: CVE-2015-0777 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: drivers/xen/usbback/usbback.c in linux-2.6.18-xen-3.4.0 (aka the Xen 3.4.xsupport patches for the Linux kernel 2.6.18), as used in the Linux kernel2.6.x and 3.x in SUSE Linux distributions, allows guest OS users to obtainsensitive information from uninitialized locations in host OS kernel memoryvia unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
